name: budibase
description: Budibase is a low-code platform for building business apps without code. It includes a UI builder, database integration, automations, and the ability to self-host or use their cloud service for internal tool development.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Build business apps without writing code. Rapid development

features.title: Database Integration
features.description: Connect to existing databases or use built-in storage. Flexible data

features.title: Workflow Automation
features.description: Automate business processes with visual workflows. Streamlined operations

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Perfect for building admin panels and dashboards. Custom solutions

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run on your own infrastructure for complete control. Data sovereignty

features.title: Cloud Option
features.description: Choose between self-hosted or managed cloud. Flexible deployment

features.title: Api Access
features.description: Programmatic access for custom integrations. Developer-friendly
